CodeList.Name: Device Events Action Taken with Device

Description.TranslatedText: A terminology codelist based on the action taken with respect to the device.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The act of checking or adjusting (by comparison with a standard) the accuracy of a measuring instrument. (NCI)
The act of taking out, extracting, or withdrawing an entity from a location.
The act of rewriting program code or application software. (NCI)

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Device Events Action Taken with Device
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Device Events Action Taken with Device Terminology
